attributes.action: take a week in my famillys life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i openly invite you to spend the week in my family's shoes  priminister's and then tell me you think that min wages is ok  if there is to be cuts why not start with all of the fat coats like yous selfs wages then see how much we can save this country

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
